channel.title: Character name Length limit?
channel.description:
Been searching around and couldnt find anything on this.
People using certain supposed "cheat clients" were making pretty unbannable 80 character names on my server and i wanted to stop them.
Tried using my own logic and failed.
Anyone help? :P
I want something that will kick anyone using a name with more than 15 characters if possible.

item.title: Character name Length limit?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

if(“Hello”.length() < 10) {
return;
}

There’s a example.

Read full topic
